column2: "Hey, <%me>. It's been a while since we've met here."
"I've been on the Amdusican Skyscape for too long. I came back to take a break."
"I was starting to think that you were going to live there!"
"Shut up, Light. A guy who obsesses over details like that, you're worthless."
"Hmm? You brought something interesting? Would you mind showing it to me?"
"Hmm? Something that missing research student left behind in the tundra?"
"That research student was supposedly killed by Darkers or native creatures."
"But something is off here... really off. Light, can you tell what that is?"
"Something strange about it? Oh, this parameter is off."
"Darker residue? Or from native creatures? Wait, it's neither!"
"Nice observation. That was my conclusion as well. This was caused by the photon weapons the ARKS use."
"I don't know the circumstances, but this is no simple missing persons case."
"If I weren't in the middle of investigating the Dragonkin, I would delve deeper into this."
"Someone might try to kill you in your sleep."
